com.gilran.chess.server

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gilran.chess.board.Game
      • com.gilran.chess.server.Game

  • public class Game
extends Game
    A chess game managed by the server.

    The game adds information specific to managing a game by the server to the information in chess.board.Game.

    Author:
    Gil Ran

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Game.EventsCallback
      A callback that takes game events.

        public Game(java.lang.String whitePlayer,

        whitePlayer - The name of the player playing white.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the game id.

      • addEvent

        public Proto.GameEvent addEvent(Proto.GameEvent.Builder eventBuilder)
        Adds an event to the game.

        In order to prevent corruption of the game events list, the method is synchronized.

      • getEvents

        public void getEvents(int minEvent,
             Game.EventsCallback callback)
        Calls the callback with the game events with serial number >= minEvent.

        If there are no events with serial number >= minEvent, the callback is kept until a new event is available, and calls the callback with the new event.

      • move

        public Proto.Status move(Piece.Color playerColor,
                java.lang.String from,
                java.lang.String to)
        Performs a move in the game.

      • resign

        public void resign(Piece.Color playerColor)
        Applies game resignation by the given player.

      • addDrawOffer

        public void addDrawOffer(Piece.Color playerColor)
        Adds a draw offer by the given player.

        If draw offers by both players are added, the game ends due to draw by agreement.

      • clearDrawOffer

        public void clearDrawOffer(Piece.Color playerColor)
        Removes an existing draw offer.
